main.name: Fabien Lesage
main.description: After finishing a MSc in Marketing Management at Toulouse Business School, I joined a marketing agency in New York then move on to a BioTech company in Miami before landing at my current position at INSEAD.
main.bio: I am a Product Marketing Manager at INSEAD

work.title: Product Marketing Manager
work.description: Launch of a new programme, build on strategy and messaging to create unique selling points, definition of the product vision, and marketing roadmap. Communicate internally and externally the unique values, data analysis. Enhance communication across departments to improve sales funnel. Lead generation and nurturing, social media campaigns, email marketing automation. Website development and management

work.title: Marketing Manager
work.description: Corporate website launch, media planning, Products launch, Market research, Analytics, projects management, budget management, Digital Marketing. SalesForce implementation. Marketing Automation implementation. Tracking, Reporting, A/B Test leading to better customer & lead engagement. Website development and management. Re-Branding, Product development & Product positioning

work.title: Account Manager
work.description: Account management, Google Analytics, SEO presence, A/B Testing, KPIs for growth, Media Campaign reports, Social Media, Emailing campaign, Client proposal, Wordpress Management, CRM, Benchmark

work.title: Junior Account Manager
work.description: Client proposal, Campaign conception and implementation, Media relation, Event management, Campaign/Google Analytics, Community management, KPIs identification

testimonials.text: Marketing is telling the world youâ€™re a rock star. Content Marketing is showing the world you are one.
